profileTitle: Your Trusted <0>Partner</0> for Paver Maintenance Services
profileText: We specialize in professional pressure washing for residential, commercial, and industrial properties. From driveways and parking lots to storefronts and large industrial surfaces, we clean, restore, and protect with detailed, attentive care. We provide pressure washing, paver sanding and sealing to keep your property looking its absolute best.

tab1.title: 1st Step
tab1.description: We begin by killing all unwanted weeds and vegetation, removing stains (oil, rust, mildew, etc.), and thoroughly extracting the old, loose sand from between the pavers. This step restores the surface and prepares it for the next stage.

tab2.title: 2nd Step
tab2.description: Next, we refill the joints with high-quality polymeric sand, ensuring a solid, weed-resistant bond. The sand is then watered to activate its binding agents, which help lock the pavers in place and prevent shifting.

tab3.title: 3rd Step
tab3.description: Finally, we apply a premium sealer that not only solidifies the sand but also enhances the appearance of your pavers with a rich, clean finish. The sealer protects against stains, UV damage, and water infiltration, giving your surface a long-lasting, beautiful look.

other_service.title: Complementary Levelling Service
other_service.description: We offer a complimentary levelling service when needed. If your pavers are uneven or sunken, we carefully take them apart, level the base, and reinstall the pavers for a smooth, even surface.
